ServerResp.description: This object represents a server response containing weekly gas measurement data.

Year.desciption: The year this measurement was taken.

Month.desciption: The month this measurement was taken.

Day.desciption: The day representing the start of the week for this measurement. Measurements are taken hourly and averaged together over a week.

DateDecimal.desciption: A decimal representation of the week this measurement was taken.

Average.desciption: The average gas measurement recorded for the week.

NumDays.desciption: The number of days measurements were taken to compute the weekly average.

OneYearAgo.desciption: The CO2 mole fraction in dry air (in parts-per-million) exactly 365 days prior to this measurement.

TenYearsAgo.desciption: The CO2 mole fraction in dry air (in parts-per-million) exactly 10*365 days + 3 days (for leap years) prior to this measurement.

IncSincePreIndustrial.desciption: The CO2 mole fraction difference in dry air (in parts-per-million) between this measurement and measurements from 1800.

Timestamp.desciption: The unix timestamp of when the measurement was recorded. This is always recorded as a date with the hh:mm:ss portion of the timestamp set to zero.

Status.desciption: The status of the response. Currently either 'OK' or 'ERROR'.

RequestId.desciption: The identifier associated with this request.
